pageTitle: Pool broadcast tape from inside London Underground stations
description: Filming on the Underground has been suspended since 7 July 2005. Media are reminded that no filming should take place on London Underground without the prior permission and approval of the press office.

title.title: Pool broadcast tape from inside London Underground stations

texts: Pool broadcast tape taken this afternoon by Reuters from inside Oval, Shepherd's Bush (Hammersmith & City), Stockwell and Warren Street London Underground stations will be available from 18:30 hours.

Filming on the Underground has been suspended since 7 July 2005. Media are reminded that no filming should take place on London Underground without the prior permission and approval of the press office.
